name: Resonate
description:
Resonate
  • Fly a Golden Orb in a sacred space, seeking out others that emit sounds with which you ‘resonate’.
  • Unite with your chosen Orbs, composing unique and beautiful polyphonic tones.
  • Lose yourself in this cosmic, transcendent experience!
Navigation:
  • Mouse forward / back - accelerate / decelerate
  • Mouse left / right - turn
  • Roll mouse wheel - change altitude
To search:
  • Hold mouse button and drag
  • Green crosshair when locked-on
When locked-on:
  • Roll mouse wheel - attract / push away
